ABOUT US

Macadangdang presents Hawaiian-Filipino Fusion Cuisine! In celebration of the island's melting pot of Asian and Polynesian flavors, Macadangdang brings you the best blend of traditional and modern dishes.

Enjoy sushi, sake, and specialty cocktails in an indoor or outdoor setting. Join us for a romantic dinner for two, an epicurean journey with friends, or a special celebration with family. Here, you'll leave with a new appreciation of island dining.

Hours

Wednesdays to Sundays

Happy Hour & Live Music -  3pm to 5pm

Dinner - 5pm to 9pm
